## Checklist

- [ ] I have read `CONTRIBUTING.md` and followed the development checklist.
- [ ] My change includes tests where appropriate and all tests pass (`npm run test`).

- **Contributors:** if you have a preferred assignee or label, add a note in the PR description and maintainers will triage.
